19709.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>You're doing great <pc>. I tried asking
around too, but, unfortunately, it was fruitless.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19709.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>「やっているね　<pc>くん。
　私も　聞き込みしてみたのだが
　残念ながら　収穫は　なかったよ。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19709.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>: 열심히 조사 중이군, <pc>.
　나도 탐문을 해 봤네만
　아쉽게도 수확은 없었어.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19709.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>你正在调查啊，<pc>。
我也在四处收集证词，
但很遗憾，没有什么收获。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19709.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>你正在調查啊，<pc>。
我也在四處收集證詞，
但很遺憾，沒有什麼收穫。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19710.en:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>What the-playing Detective Rubecca, are you. What
are you investigating for it to have you wanting to
ask about lullabies?<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19710.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>「なんじゃ。ルベカの探偵ごっこか。
　子守唄について　聞きたいとは
　何を　調べているのやら。<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19710.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>: 뭐냐, 루베카의 탐정놀이였구먼.
　자장가에 대해 탐문이라니
　대체 뭘 조사하는 게냐?<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19710.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>哦，露贝卡在玩侦探游戏吗。
想打听关于摇篮曲的事情啊，
你想调查些什么？<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19710.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>怎麼，原來是露貝卡的偵探遊戲啊。
你想打聽搖籃曲的事，
是想調查些什麼？<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19711.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>Miss Barbasa, don't you know any lullabies about, like,
hearing voices or being swallowed by darkness?<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19711.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「バーバサさんは　声が聞こえるとか
　闇に呑まれるとか　そういう歌詞の
　子守唄を　知りませんか？<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19711.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: 바바사 씨, 혹시 목소리가 들린다든가
　어둠에 삼켜진다는 가사가 들어간
　자장가 모르세요?<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19711.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>巴巴萨大婶知道歌词类似
“那个声音”、“将被黑暗吞没”
之类的摇篮曲吗？<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19711.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>芭芭莎婆婆知道歌詞類似
「那個聲音」、「將被黑暗吞沒」之類的搖籃曲嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19712.en:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>Oh, THAT's the song you're on about. I think I sang
it to you when you were little.<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19712.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>「おお　それは　あの歌のことじゃな。
　ルベカが　小さいころに
　唄ってやったことが　ある気がするのう。<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19712.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>: 아아, 그 노래 말이구먼.
　루베카 네가 어렸을 때
　불러 준 적이 있는 것 같구나.<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19712.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>哦，你是说那首歌吧。
记得露贝卡小的时候，
我还给你唱过呢。<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19712.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>喔喔，妳是說那首歌吧。
記得露貝卡小的時候，
我還給妳唱過呢。<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28478.en: <start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>Give me a minute to think back and try to sing it.<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28478.ja: <start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>「昔を思いだして　ちょっと　唄ってみようかね。<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28478.ko: <start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>: 옛날 기억을 되살려 조금 불러 볼까.<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28478.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>让我找找以前的感觉，试着唱一下吧。<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28478.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>我就回溯記憶，試著唱一下吧。<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19713.en:
<center>♪ Go to sleeeep~ good baby go to sleeeep~
Go to sleeeep~ quickly go to sleeeep~
If you don't sleeeep, you will heeeear~ ♪
19713.ja:
<center>ねーむれ～　よい子よ　ねーむれ～。
ねーむれ～　今すぐ　ねーむれ～。
ねむらーないと　聞こえてくーる～♪
19713.ko:
<center>자장자장~ 착한 아이는 잠을 잔다~
자장자장~ 지금 바로 잠을 잔다~
잠을 자지 않으면 들릴 테니~♪
19713.zh-Hans:
<center>睡吧～好孩子，睡吧～
睡吧～赶快，睡吧～
要是不睡～就会听到～♪
19713.zh-Hant:
<center>睡吧～好孩子睡吧～
睡吧～趕快睡吧～
要是不睡～就會聽到～♪

28437.en:
<center>♪ Your death, drawing neeeear~ and hear that vooooice~
Life's radiaaaance~ swallowed by abyssss.
So, gooood baby~ ♪
28437.ja:
<center>おまえが死ぬと～　聞こえる　あの声～。
命の～　輝きが　闇に呑まれるーと～。
だーから　よいー子よ～♪
28437.ko:
<center>네가 죽으면~ 들리는 그 목소리~
생명의~ 빛이 어둠에 삼켜지네~
그러니까 착한 아이는~♪
28437.zh-Hans:
<center>那个声音说～你将死去～
生命的光辉～将被黑暗吞没～
所以～好孩子啊～♪
28437.zh-Hant:
<center>那個聲音說～你將死去～
生命的光輝～將被黑暗吞沒～
所以～好孩子啊～♪

28438.en:
<center>♪ Before she calls your naaaame~
Go to sleeeep~ quickly go to sleeeep~ ♪
28438.ja:
<center>名前を～　呼ばれる　その前ーに～。
ねーむれ～　今すぐ　ねーむれ～♪
28438.ko:
<center>이름을~ 부르기 전에~
자장자장~ 지금 바로 잠을 잔다~♪
28438.zh-Hans:
<center>在叫到～你的名字之前～
睡吧～赶快睡吧～♪
28438.zh-Hant:
<center>在叫到～你的名字之前～
睡吧～趕快睡吧～♪

19714.en:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>Long ago, it was often sung, but the children found it
creepy. Before you knew it, it got to where we stopped
singing it.<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19714.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>「昔は　よう唄われとったんじゃが
　子供たちが　気味悪がってのう。
　いつの間にか　唄われないようになったんじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19714.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>: 옛날에는 자주 불렀다만
　아이들이 무서워해서
　어느샌가 부르지 않게 되었지.<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19714.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>以前常有人唱这首儿歌，
但孩子们都很害怕，
所以不知何时起就没有人再传唱了。<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19714.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>以前常有人唱這首兒歌，
但孩子們都很害怕，
所以不知何時起就沒有人再傳唱了。<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19715.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>Your death, drawing near. Life's radiance swallowed by
abyss... That's it. That's the lullaby...<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19715.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「おまえが死ぬ。命の輝きが　闇に呑まれる……。
　そうよ。この子守唄だわ……。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19715.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: 네가 죽는다.
　생명의 빛이 어둠에 삼켜진다…….
　맞아, 이 자장가였어…….<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19715.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>你会死去。生命的光辉，将被黑暗吞没……
没错，就是这首摇篮曲……<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19715.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>你將死去。生命的光輝，將被黑暗吞沒……
沒錯，就是這首搖籃曲……<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19716.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>Miss Barbasa, do you know anything else about
that lullaby!?<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19716.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「バーバサさん　その子守唄について
　他に　知っていることは　ありませんか！？<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19716.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: 바바사 씨, 그 자장가에 대해
　더 아는 건 없으세요!?<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19716.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>关于这首摇篮曲，
巴巴萨大婶还知道些什么吗？！<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19716.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>關於這首搖籃曲，
芭芭莎婆婆還知道些什麼嗎！？<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19717.en:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>Let me see... My mother used to sing it, but long ago,
it was written by a traveling poet who stopped by
the village, I think she said...<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19717.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>「はて……。これを　唄ってくれた母が
　昔　この村に立ち寄った　旅の詩人が作ったと
　言っておったような……。<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19717.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>: 음……. 이 자장가를 불러 주시던 어머니가
　말씀하시길 옛날에 이 마을을 찾은
　떠돌이 시인이 만든 노래라고 하더구나…….<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19717.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>我想想……这是妈妈教给我的。
妈妈好像还说，
这首歌是以前路过村子的旅行诗人创作的……<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19717.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>我想想……唱給我聽的媽媽，
好像曾說過這是以前
路過村子的旅行詩人所創作的歌……<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19718.en:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>It seems the poet traveled around the world and wrote
songs based on things he heard in places he stayed
at during his travels.<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19718.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>「その詩人は　世界を旅して回り
　旅先で聞いた出来事なんかを　もとにして
　歌を作っておったらしいぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19718.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>: 그 시인은 세계를 떠돌며
　여행지에서 들은 이야기나 사건을 바탕으로
　노래를 만든다고 했었다.<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19718.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>据说那位诗人周游世界，
并以旅途的见闻为素材创作了歌曲。<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19718.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>據說那位詩人周遊世界，
並以旅途的見聞為題材
創作了歌曲。<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19719.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>...That means there must've been some incident that
the lullaby is based off, right?<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19719.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「……ということは　この子守唄にも 
　もとになった出来事か何かが
　あったってことよね？<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19719.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: ……그렇다면 이 자장가에도
　바탕이 된 이야기나 사건이
　있었단 거네요?<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19719.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>……这么说来，
这首摇篮曲也是根据
某些事件创作的？<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19719.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>……也就是說，
這首搖籃曲應該也是
根據某些事件所創作的吧？<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19720.en:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>Maybe after Leen Village, the poet went to Julet in
search of new material, y'know.<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19720.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>「おそらく　その詩人は　レーンの村の次は
　新たな歌の題材を探して　ジュレットの町にでも
　行ったんじゃないかのう。<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19720.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>: 아마도 그 시인은 렌 마을 다음에는
　새로운 노래의 소재를 찾아
　주레트 마을로 가지 않았을까 싶구나.<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19720.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>诗人离开雷恩村后，
为了寻找新的题材，
似乎又去了玖莱特镇。<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19720.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>那位詩人離開雷恩村後，
為了尋找新的題材，
很可能也去了玖萊特鎮。<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19721.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>If that's the case, there's a chance some of the
elders in Julet might know about the poet...<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19721.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「それじゃ　ジュレットのお年寄りなら
　その詩人のことを　知ってる人がいる
　可能性があるか……。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19721.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: 그럼 주레트에 사는 노인이라면
　그 시인을 아는 사람이
　있을 수도 있겠어…….<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19721.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>那么，在玖莱特镇里的
上了年纪的人中，
说不定有人见过那个诗人呢……<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19721.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>那麼，在玖萊特鎮的老人家中，
說不定有人
曾見過那個詩人嗎……<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19722.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>Hmm... It's not much to go on, but could you interview
the old folks in Julet and find what they know about
the traveling poet.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19722.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「ん～……。ちょっと　頼りない情報だけど 
　ジュレットの町の　お年寄りにも聞き込みして
　旅の詩人のことを　調べてくれるかな。 <stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19722.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: 음……. 조금 막연한 정보긴 하지만
　주레트 마을의 노인에게도 탐문을 해서
　떠돌이 시인에 대해 조사해 줄래?<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19722.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>嗯……这个情报虽然不太可靠，
但能麻烦你去玖莱特镇，
找上了年纪的人收集有关旅行诗人的证词吗？<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19722.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>嗯……這個情報雖然不太可靠，
但能麻煩你去玖萊特鎮
找老人家打聽一下旅行詩人的情報嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19723.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>I'll go too, but if I take off without saying anything
Dad will give me an earful, so I'll get permission
to leave. <pc>, go on ahead.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19723.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「私も行くけど　だまって出かけると
　お父さん　うるさいから　外出許可とってくる。
　<pc>は　先に向かっててね。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19723.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: 나도 가겠지만 말도 없이 외출하면
　아빠가 잔소리할 테니 외출 허가를 받고 올게.
　{pc}|hpp(은,는) 먼저 출발해 줘.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19723.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>我随后也去。但不打声招呼就出门
会被爸爸说的。我去找他申请外出。
<pc>就先去玖莱特镇吧。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19723.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>我雖然也會去，但是得先去跟爸爸報備一聲，
不然他事後知道會很囉唆的。
<pc>就先去玖萊特鎮吧。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28479.en: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>Mmm, found some clues by chance, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28479.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>「むむっ。もしかして　何か
　手がかりを見つけたのかね　<pc>くん。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28479.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>: 응? <pc>, 자네 혹시
　단서를 찾은 건가?<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28479.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>唔唔！<pc>，你是不是
找到什么线索了？<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28479.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>唔唔！<pc>，你是不是

28481.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>...Julet. Standing seashells house. Lovers gathering on
the beach. Songs of love. Songs of parting. Smelling
the sea breeze. Songs of the sea...<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28481.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「……ジュレットの町。立ち並ぶ貝がらの家。
　浜辺に集う恋人たち。愛の歌。別れの歌。
　香る潮風。海の歌……。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28481.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: ……주레트 마을. 늘어선 조개껍데기 집.
　해변에 모인 연인들. 사랑 노래. 이별 노래.
　바닷바람 내음. 바다의 노래…….<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28481.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>……玖莱特镇。一排贝壳房屋。
情侣聚集在海边。爱之歌。离别之歌。
芬芳的海风。海之歌……<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28481.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>……玖萊特鎮。一排貝殼房屋。
情侶聚集在海邊。愛之歌。離別之歌。
芬芳的海風。海之歌……<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28486.en:

28488.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>...'Leen Village. Very interesting story. A girl who
calls forth death. Scared villagers'.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28488.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「……レーンの村。興味深い話。
　死を呼ぶ少女。恐れる村人。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28488.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: ……렌 마을. 흥미로운 이야기.

28488.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>……雷恩村。怪异的传说。
召唤死亡的女孩。陷入恐惧的村民。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28488.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>……雷恩村。怪異的傳說。
召喚死亡的女孩。陷入恐懼的村民。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28489.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>...'A villager who dies at the call of their name.
A girl using words to kill'...<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28489.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「……名前を呼ばれて　死ぬ村人。
　少女が使う　死の言葉とは……。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28489.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: ……이름을 불리면 죽는 마을 사람들.
　소녀가 사용하는 죽음의 말이란…….<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28489.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>……被叫到名字的村民会死。
女孩所用的死亡之语是……<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28489.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>……被叫到名字的村民會死。
女孩所用的死亡話語是……<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28490.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>...'death drawing near. Life's radiance swallowed by
abyss'.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28490.ja: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「…………が死ぬ。命の輝き　闇に呑まれる。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28490.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: …………가 죽는다.

28490.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>…………会死去。生命的光辉，将被黑暗吞没。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28490.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>…………將死去。生命的光輝，將被黑暗吞沒。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28491.en: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>I knew it... I couldn't mishear something like that...<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28491.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「これって　やっぱり……。
　あれは　空耳なんかじゃ　なかったんだわ……。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28491.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: 이건 역시…….
　그건 환청이 아니었던 거야…….<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28491.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>这果然是……
所以那真的不是我幻听……<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>這果然是……
所以那真的不是我幻聽……<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28492.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>...Hold on, <pc>. I know this is going to
sound weird, but I want you to hear me out.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28492.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「……あのね　<pc>。

28492.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: ……있잖아, <pc>.

28492.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>……我说啊，<pc>，

28492.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>……我說啊，<pc>，

28493.en: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>In my head. Sometimes I hear a girl's voice.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28493.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「私のアタマの中でね。
　ときどき　女の子の声が　聞こえるの。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28493.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: 나 말이야, 머릿속에서

28493.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>其实，我脑中

28493.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>其實，我腦中
有時候會聽到一個女孩子的聲音。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28494.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>......'death drawing near. Life's radiance swallowed by

28494.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「…………が死ぬ。
　命の輝きが　闇に呑まれる……って。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28494.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: …………가 죽는다.
　생명의 빛이 어둠에 삼켜진다…… 하고.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28494.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>她说…………会死去。

28494.zh-Hant:

28495.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>It was kind of creepy and... I told myself it was

28495.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「なんだか　気味が悪いし……。

28495.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: 좀 찜찜해서…….

28495.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>我总觉得毛毛的……
只能说服自己那是错觉。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28495.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>我總覺得毛毛的……
只能說服自己那是錯覺。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28496.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>But when I saw the Old Village Census had that
girl's name erased, I had a really bad feeling...<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28496.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「だけど　古い村人名簿から
　女の子の名前が　消されてるのを見たとき
　すごく　イヤな予感がして……。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28496.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: 하지만 오래된 주민 명부에서
　여자아이의 이름이 지워진 걸 봤을 때
　엄청나게 불길한 예감이 들지 뭐야…….<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28496.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>可是，在我看到老旧村民名册上
有个女孩的名字被涂掉时，
就产生了一种不祥的预感……<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28496.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>可是，在我看到老舊的村民名冊上
有個女孩的名字被塗掉時，
就產生了一種不祥的預感……<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28497.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>I remembered that the lullaby I heard long ago had
the same words as the voice in my head!<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28497.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「昔　聴いた子守唄に　アタマの中の声と
　同じ言葉があったのを　思いだしたの！<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28497.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: 그러다 오래전에 들은 자장가와
　머릿속에서 들리는 말에
　똑같은 단어가 있다는 걸 떠올린 거지!<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28497.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>因为我想起小时候听过的摇篮曲，

28497.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>因為我想起小時候聽過的搖籃曲，
出現與那個說話聲一樣的詞語！<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28498.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>What I heard in my head was probably that girl's
voice...<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28498.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「私のアタマの中に　聞こえるのは

28498.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: 내 머릿속에서 들리는 건

28498.zh-Hans:

28498.zh-Hant:

28499.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>Why does she talk to me? Who the heck is that
girl?<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28499.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「なんで　私に話しかけるの？

28499.ko:

28499.zh-Hans:

28499.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>她到底為什麼要跟我說話？

28500.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>To get her named erased from the village census,

28500.ja:

28500.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: 주민 명부에서도 이름이 지워지다니

28500.zh-Hans:

28500.zh-Hant:

19724.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>...After this, I think I'm going to look into that
girl. At that time, please lend me your help again.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19724.zh-Hans:
